items.title: Cosmopolitan cocktail
items.description: Lipsmackingly sweet and sour, the Cosmopolitan cocktail of vodka, cranberry, orange liqueur and citrus is a good-time in a glass. Perfect for a party

items.title: Passion fruit martini
items.description: This easy passion fruit cocktail is bursting with zingy flavours and is perfect for celebrating with friends. Top with prosecco for a special tipple

image.alt: Passion fruit cocktails in glasses with olives and halved fruit
image.title: Passion fruit martini

items.title: Irish whiskey old fashioned
items.description: Add a twist to an old fashioned and use elderflower cordial in place of the usual orange. It’s a sophisticated cocktail to add to a dinner party

image.alt: Irish whiskey old fashioned served in a tumbler glass
image.title: Irish whiskey old fashioned

items.title: Raspberry mojito
items.description: Blend fresh raspberries with lime, mint, sugar, white rum and sparkling water to make a punchy raspberry mojito that's perfect for summer parties

image.alt: Raspberry mojito served in two tall glasses
image.title: Raspberry mojito

items.title: Raspberry gin
items.description: Preserve the taste of summer in a bottle with this raspberry gin, perfect topped up with tonic. The gin will keep its lovely pink hue for a few months

image.alt: Raspberry gin served in a bottle with fresh raspberries
image.title: Raspberry gin

items.title: Vodka martini
items.description: Make an easy vodka martini with our simple recipe for an elegant party tipple. Serve your cool cocktail with an olive or a twist of lemon peel

image.alt: Martini with lemon peel in glass
image.title: Vodka martini

items.title: Watermelon daiquiri
items.description: Looking for a refreshing summer cocktail to entertain friends? Try a watermelon daiquiri with white rum, lime juice and watermelon liqueur

image.alt: Watermelon daiquiri served in a cocktail glass with a wedge of watermelon
image.title: Watermelon daiquiri

items.title: Sex on the beach cocktail
items.description: Combine vodka with peach schnapps and cranberry juice to make a classic sex on the beach cocktail. Garnish with cocktail cherries and orange slices

image.alt: Two sex on the beach cocktails
image.title: Sex on the beach cocktail

items.title: Vietnamese mojito
items.description: Add a Vietnamese twist to a classic mojito cocktail with perilla leaves, ginger and lemongrass cordial. A refreshing accompaniment to any Asian menu

image.alt: A glass serving a Vietnamese mojito garnished with a slice of lime and a straw
image.title: Vietnamese mojito

items.title: Classic shandy
items.description: Customise this classic shandy with your choice of beer and let the lemonade bring that citrus zing. It's a great thirst-quencher on hot, balmy days

image.alt: Classic shandy in a large glass
image.title: Classic shandy

items.title: Pink gin iced tea
items.description: Blend pink gin with iced tea and you have this unique cocktail, made with spiced rum, elderflower and pink grapefruit. Serve in a jug for a sharing cocktail

image.alt: Pink gin iced tea served in a jug and two glasses
image.title: Pink gin iced tea

items.title: Pink negroni
items.description: Go pink with this fabulous cocktail flavoured with pink gin, rose vermouth and Aperol. Garnish with a wedge of pink grapefruit and a basil leaf to serve

items.title: Long Island iced tea
items.description: Mix a jug of this classic cocktail for a summer party. It's made with equal parts of vodka, gin, tequila, rum and triple sec, plus lime, cola and plenty of ice

image.alt: Long Island iced tea in a tumbler with lime wedge
image.title: Long Island iced tea

items.title: Sloe gin cocktail
items.description: This autumnal hedgerow cocktail has a blend of botanical notes from the gin, infused with a juniper syrup, which makes for a sweet-sharp tipple

items.title: Classic gin martini
items.description: Enjoy a classic dry martini. This is a good example of how ice is an ingredient in its own right. Take time stirring and tasting it until it’s to your liking

items.title: Cherry bakewell cocktail
items.description: Turn the flavours of cherry bakewell into a cocktail with amaretto and cherry cordial. Finish with a maraschino cherry for the ultimate kitsch beverage

image.alt: Two cherry bakewell cocktails with ice
image.title: Cherry bakewell cocktail

items.title: Beer mojito
items.description: Beer lovers rejoice: you can swap soda water for beer to give a classic mojito a delightful twist while still maintaining the white rum, mint and lime flavours

image.alt: Classic beer mojito served in a tall glass
image.title: Classic beer mojito

items.title: Mojito pitcher
items.description: Make a jug of refreshing mojitos to share, so you can spend more time with your guests. Try our three twists on this classic cocktail, too

items.title: Brandy sour
items.description: Treat yourself to the classic cocktail brandy sour. With lemon juice and egg white, it's silky smooth and delicious. Serve with a slice of lemon and cherry

image.alt: Brandy sour in two tumbler glasses
image.title: Brandy sour

items.title: Champagne cocktail
items.description: Blend some chilled champagne with brandy and bitters for a sophisticated champagne cocktail. Garnish with an orange twist to serve

image.alt: Champagne cocktail in a cocktail glass
image.title: Champagne cocktail

items.title: Michelada
items.description: Cold lager, chilli powder, pepper and lime: spice up your lager with this Mexican cocktail, popular throughout Latin America and great for a summer party

image.alt: A bottle of lager being poured into a glass with a wedge of lime alongside
image.title: Michelada

items.title: Easy white sangria
items.description: Try this refreshing twist on a traditional sangria and use white wine instead of red with elderflower to complement the fruit. Perfect for summer parties

image.alt: A jug of white wine sangria and three glasses
image.title: Easy white sangria

items.title: Hurricane cocktail
items.description: Our tropical, rum-based hurricane cocktail is easy to make and sure to get your party started. Garnish with orange and cocktail cherries for a kitsch touch

image.alt: Hurricane cocktail in a glass with an orange slice and cherry
image.title: Hurricane cocktail

items.title: Perfect spritz
items.description: Try this spritz for a party. It's sure to impress with a hint of lavender putting a lightly floral twist on a Perfect (sweet vermouth, dry vermouth and gin)

image.alt: A bottle of red vermouth and two glasses of spritz on a tray
image.title: Perfect spritz

items.title: Rum old-fashioned
items.description: Try using rum in place of whisky in an old-fashioned for a twist on the traditional cocktail. Finish with ice and a strip of orange peel

items.title: Singapore sling
items.description: Mix gin with cherry brandy, Benedictine, Angostura bitters, pineapple and lime juice to make this classic cocktail. Garnish with pineapple and a cherry

items.title: Buck's fizz
items.description: The simple and classic combination of orange juice and champagne makes a perfect cocktail for a celebratory brunch or party

image.alt: Flute glasses filled with Buck's fizz
image.title: Buck's fizz

items.title: Mulled wine cocktail
items.description: The perfect party drink, as it can be made well ahead, then brought out of the fridge as guests arrive – or serve it hot for a traditional winter warmer

items.title: Cranberry vodka
items.description: This bittersweet fruity vodka is best served well chilled in shot glasses. It can also be made with other berries like blackcurrants or strawberries.

items.title: Mojito recipe
items.description: Mix this classic cocktail for a party using fresh mint, white rum, sugar, zesty lime and cooling soda water. Play with the quantities to suit your taste.

image.alt: two glasses of mojito cocktail with stirrer
image.title: Mojito cocktail

items.title: Vodka & cranberry blush
items.description: A sophisticated dinner party cocktail with a crisp cranberry kick

items.title: Classic champagne cocktail
items.description: Serve this cocktail in a flute so the sugar cube sinks to the bottom – it will drive the bubbles upward. Prosecco, crémant and cava also work well

image.alt: Classic champagne cocktail in a tall flute glass
image.title: Classic champagne cocktail

items.title: Tequila sunrise
items.description: Master the art of a classic tequila sunrise, with grenadine, tequila, triple sec, orange juice – and of course a cocktail cherry and umbrella as garnish

image.alt: Tequila sunrise served with an umbrella
image.title: Tequila sunrise

items.title: Strawberry gin
items.description: Capture the true taste of summer with this berry-infused spirit that makes a stunning gin 'n' tonic or base for a fruity cocktail

items.title: Bramble
items.description: Mix a classic bramble cocktail, essentially a gin sour spiked with an eye-catching shot of blackberry liqueur. We have three twists, too – ideal if you're entertaining

image.alt: Bramble cocktails in tumblers with blackberry garnish
image.title: Bramble cocktails

items.title: The perfect bloody mary
items.description: This bloody mary has a lot of ingredients but, trust us, it’s worth it. Perfect for a dinner party garnished with an olive, or just as a treat at the weekend

image.alt: A platter serving bloody marys and bacon bowls
image.title: Bloody marys and bacon bowls

items.title: Classic negroni
items.description: To make the perfect classic negroni cocktail all you need is balance: use equal parts gin, vermouth and Campari, and choose the best products you have in reach

image.alt: Classic negroni served in a tumbler glass
image.title: Classic negroni

items.title: Woo woo
items.description: Mix vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice and fresh lime to make this perfect party cocktail, garnished with a lime wedge (and maybe a tiny umbrella too)

items.title: Piña colada
items.description: A tropical blend of rich coconut cream, white rum and tangy pineapple – serve with an umbrella for kitsch appeal

image.alt: Pina colada cocktails in glasses with pineapple wedges
image.title: Pina colada cocktail

items.title: Upcycled white Russian
items.description: Use leftover grounds as a base for this fresh take on the classic coffee cocktail. We like a splash of Black Cow vodka blended with the cream, vanilla and rum

items.title: Sazerac
items.description: Indulge in a classic sazerac cocktail, with whiskey, absinthe, bitters and an orange garnish. Try on the rocks if you’d prefer

image.alt: Sazerac in glass with orange peel garnish
image.title: Sazerac cocktail

items.title: Rhubarb gin
items.description: Use seasonal rhubarb to make this G&T-with-a-difference, or top the finished gin with soda water for a refreshing and gloriously pink summertime drink

items.title: Earl Grey martini
items.description: This delicious twist on a martini is made with just three ingredients and takes minutes to make. The bergamot oil in the Earl Grey gives a lovely citrus hit

items.title: Screwdriver
items.description: Bring the taste of summer holidays to your next party. Mix freshly squeezed orange juice with vodka and Angostura bitters for a classic screwdriver cocktail

image.alt: Screwdriver served in a tumbler glass
image.title: Screwdriver

items.title: Bergamot mojito
items.description: Perfumed bergamot zest and juice are combined with rum, mint, lime and sugar in a twist on the standard mojito - serve at a dinner party as guests arrive

items.title: Compound gin
items.description: Using just a few ingredients, you can create your own bespoke blend of compound gin - equally perfect for presents or your own drinks cabinet

items.title: Boulevardier
items.description: Make a classic boulevardier cocktail if you're a fan of negronis. It's similar, but made with bourbon instead of gin for a more harmonious blend

items.title: Vermouth & soda
items.description: Choose red, white or rosé vermouth to make this easy cocktail – ideal for a party. Garnish with green olives and a lemon slice for the professional finish

image.alt: Vermouth & soda cocktails served in tall glasses
image.title: Vermouth & soda

items.title: English garden cocktail
items.description: Celebrate summer with an English garden cocktail. It's a refreshing mix of gin, elderflower cordial and apple juice, plus mint, lemon and cucumber flavours

items.title: Berry daiquiri
items.description: Our easy berry daiquiri is the perfect cocktail to quench your thirst when summer arrives. This cool slushy drink is great for entertaining too

items.title: Passionfruit & elderflower spritz
items.description: Serve guests this stylish passionfruit and elderflower spritz for a grown-up, alcohol-free party drink. It's fruity, fizzy and very festive

items.title: Dark & stormy coffee cocktail
items.description: Are you a die-hard fan of a dark and stormy? Twist up a classic cocktail with a dash of freshly brewed espresso to pair with traditional ginger beer

items.title: Reverse espresso martini
items.description: Everyone loves a martini. Perk up this twist on a classic cocktail with a festive splash of Baileys and a shot of coffee to help you party on

items.title: Spice 75
items.description: This is a sophisticated, aromatic twist on the classic French 75, to get it ready for the festive season. A boozy taste of Christmas in a glass

items.title: Med red snapper
items.description: Using Spanish gin infused with a unique mixture of botanicals, this reinvented classic cocktail has a grown-up bitter backbone and subtle spiciness

items.title: Eastern breeze
items.description: Christmas is hectic enough, so this vibrant vegan cocktail couldn’t be simpler to make and is perfect for batch making quickly for a large group

items.title: Cranberry sea breeze punch
items.description: Get the party started with this refreshing punch. Making fruit ice cubes stops the cranberries from sinking to the bottom of the glass – clever!

items.title: Coco fizz
items.description: Spruce up the classic coconut and rum combination with a dash of Prosecco and a squeeze of lime for a festive cocktail you can shake up in seconds

items.title: Grapefruit spritz
items.description: Spritz up your Christmas party cocktail menu with a zesty grapefruit drink, topped off with a dash of Aperol and a splash of Prosecco. Garnish with a twist

items.title: Courgette martini
items.description: Courgette and martini may seem unlikely bedfellows, but blended with lemon and shots of gin and vermouth, this is a delicious take on a cocktail classic

items.title: Frozen caipirinha
items.description: Cool down with this frozen spin on the classic Brazilian Caipirinha. The secret is squeezing as much lime into the sugar as you can

items.title: Summer punch
items.description: A simple, refreshing drink that's perfect for a summery gathering. For an extra-special twist, swap the sparkling water for champagne

items.title: Frozen strawberry daiquiri
items.description: This slushy cocktail is best made when strawberries are in season and at their ripest. With just four ingredients you can whip up this thirst quencher in 10 minutes.

items.title: Boozy dark delight
items.description: Enjoy this night-cap cocktail to round off your evening. Made with stout, whisky and orange liqueur, it's smooth and rich – ideal for cooler evenings

image.alt: Boozy dark delight cocktail served in a short glass with chocolate shavings on top
image.title: Boozy dark delight

items.title: Elderflower & gooseberry vodka
items.description: Add a shot of this fruity, fragrant infused vodka to a cocktail or serve simply with lemonade or tonic water

items.title: Bloody mary recipe
items.description: Learn how to make the ultimate bloody mary with our easy recipe. Turn up the Tabasco spice or dial it down to mix this classic vodka cocktail to your taste

image.alt: A bloody mary cocktail in a tall glass
image.title: Bloody mary

items.title: St Nick's flip
items.description: Nick Jones and Leah de Felice Renton from Birds & Bats Wines describe their cocktail creation as a creamy Christmas dessert in a glass, sign us up!

items.title: Hot gin toddy
items.description: Wind down at the end of the day with this gin-based hot toddy made with warming lemon, orange, honey and spices. It's also a great Christmas tipple

image.alt: Hot gin toddy in two glasses
image.title: Hot gin toddy

items.title: Ginger spritz
items.description: Enjoy an ale, prosecco and ginger beer cocktail – it's a summery tipple that will have you and your pals fizzing with excitement at your next get-together

image.alt: Spritzy summer surprise cocktail in a glass
image.title: Ginger spritz cocktail

items.title: Bourbon cocktail
items.description: Serve this zingy cocktail, with crème de cacao and grenadine, with a twist of pared orange zest for a stylish party drink

items.title: Rum punch
items.description: Shivi Ramoutar's recipe for this classic Caribbean cocktail combines sweet and sour flavours for a fruity weekend tipple

items.title: Amaretto fizz
items.description: There's nothing like a quick cocktail to kick start your dinner party

items.title: Apple, elderflower & gin cocktails
items.description: Cool off with this gin-based cocktail with both fruity and floral notes

items.title: Rumberry punch
items.description: Big jugs of cocktails are great for a party, let guests help themselves to this cranberry and dark rum drink

items.title: Rhubarb & custard cocktail
items.description: An elegant vodka-based drink that'll wow your guests - it's made with creamy advocaat liqueur and homemade fruit syrup

items.title: Apple prosecco punch
items.description: Spritz up a basic apple cocktail with a dash of prosecco and a splash of vodka
